foreignData.name: Die Sande aufwühlen
foreignData.text:
Erzeuge drei 2/2 schwarze Zombie-Kreaturenspielsteine.
Umwandlung {3}{B} ({3}{B}, wirf diese Karte ab: Ziehe eine Karte.)
Wenn du Die Sande aufwühlen umwandelst, erzeuge einen 2/2 schwarzen Zombie-Kreaturenspielstein.

foreignData.name: Agitar las arenas
foreignData.text:
Crea tres fichas de criatura Zombie negras 2/2.
Ciclo {3}{B}. ({3}{B}, descartar esta carta: Roba una carta.)
Cuando actives la habilidad de ciclo de Agitar las arenas, crea una ficha de criatura Zombie negra 2/2.

foreignData.name: Éveil du sable
foreignData.text:
Créez trois jetons de créature 2/2 noire Zombie.
Recyclage {3}{B} ({3}{B}, défaussez-vous de cette carte : Piochez une carte.)
Quand vous recyclez l'Éveil du sable, créez un jeton de créature 2/2 noire Zombie.

foreignData.name: Smuovere le Sabbie
foreignData.text:
Crea tre pedine creatura Zombie 2/2 nere.
Ciclo {3}{B} ({3}{B}, Scarta questa carta: Pesca una carta.)
Quando cicli Smuovere le Sabbie, crea una pedina creatura Zombie 2/2 nera.

foreignData.name: 砂の撹拌
foreignData.text:
黒の２/２のゾンビ・クリーチャー・トークンを３体生成する。
サイクリング{3}{B}（{3}{B}, このカードを捨てる：カードを１枚引く。）
あなたが砂の撹拌をサイクリングしたとき、黒の２/２のゾンビ・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。

foreignData.name: 모래 젓기
foreignData.text:
2/2 흑색 좀비 생물 토큰 세 개를 만든다.
순환 {3}{B} ({3}{B}, 이 카드를 버린다: 카드 한 장을 뽑는다.)
모래 젓기를 순환할 때, 2/2 흑색 좀비 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignData.name: Agitar as Areias
foreignData.text:
Crie três fichas de criatura preta 2/2 do tipo Zumbi.
Reciclar {3}{B} ({3}{B}, Descarte este card: Compre um card.)
Quando reciclar Agitar as Areias, crie uma ficha de criatura preta 2/2 do tipo Zumbi.

foreignData.name: Возмущение Песков
foreignData.text:
Создайте три фишки существа 2/2 черный Зомби.
Цикл {3}{B} ({3}{B}, сбросьте эту карту: возьмите карту.)
Когда вы совершаете цикл Возмущения Песков, создайте одну фишку существа 2/2 черный Зомби.

foreignData.name: 惊扰沙漠
foreignData.text:
派出三个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。
循环{3}{B}（{3}{B}，弃掉此牌：抓一张牌。）
当你循环惊扰沙漠时，派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

foreignData.name: 驚擾沙漠
foreignData.text:
派出三個2/2黑色殭屍衍生生物。
循環{3}{B}（{3}{B}，棄掉此牌：抽一張牌。）
當你循環驚擾沙漠時，派出一個2/2黑色殭屍衍生生物。

name: Stir the Sands
originalText:
Create three 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
Cycling {3}{B} ({3}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Stir the Sands, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

rulings.text: Some cards with cycling have an ability that triggers when you cycle them. These triggered abilities resolve before you draw from the cycling ability.
Triggered abilities from cycling a card and the cycling ability itself aren’t spells. Effects that interact with spells (such as that of Cancel) won’t affect them.

You can cycle a card even if it has a triggered ability from cycling that won’t have a legal target. This is because the cycling ability and the triggered ability are separate. This also means that if either ability doesn’t resolve (due to being countered with Disallow, for example, or if the triggered ability’s targets have become illegal), the other ability will still resolve.

text:
Create three 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.
Cycling {3}{B} ({3}{B}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Stir the Sands, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
